parameters.name: AddressIpVersion
parameters.description:
The IP version of the NLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Ipv4**

Enumeration values:

*   IPv4: IPv4
*   DualStack: dual-stack

parameters.name: LoadBalancerBusinessStatus
parameters.description:
The business status of the GWLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Normal**: running as expected
*   **FinancialLocked**: locked due to overdue payments

parameters.name: LoadBalancerIds
parameters.description: The GWLB instance IDs. You can query at most 20 GWLB instances in each call.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerNames
parameters.description: The GWLB instance names. You can specify at most 20 GWLB instance names in each call.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerStatus
parameters.description:
The GWLB instance status. Valid values:

*   **Active**: The GWLB instance is running.
*   **Inactive**: The GWLB instance is disabled. Listeners of GWLB instances in the Inactive state do not forward traffic.
*   **Provisioning**: The GWLB instance is being created.
*   **Configuring**: The GWLB instance is being modified.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 1000. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   If **NextToken** is empty, no next page exists.
*   If a value of **NextToken** is returned, the value indicates the token that is used for the next query.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to be skipped in the call.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. You can specify up to 20 tags in each call.

parameters.name: TrafficMode
parameters.description:
Specifies the traffic processing mode. Valid values:

*   **LoadBalance**: load balancing mode. GWLB continues to forward traffic to backend servers.
*   **ByPass**: bypass mode. GWLB directly returns traffic to the GWLB endpoint without forwarding it to the backend servers.

parameters.name: VpcIds
parameters.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) IDs. You can query at most 20 IDs in each call.

parameters.name: ZoneIds
parameters.description: The zone IDs. You can query at most 20 zone IDs in each call.
